header.text: Manage your API keys for authenticating with Napas APIs.

header.subtitle: Essential Steps for Protecting and Using Your API Key

instructions.subtitle: To make a successful API call, you must use the granted API Key value and set it in the request Header:

content: Strictly prohibit displaying the API Key in client-side code or public repositories.
Store the API Key in an environment variable or a secure vault system on the server.
Use different Keys for the test environment and the production environment.
Immediately revoke any API Keys that are no longer in use or suspected of being compromised (leaked).
